p: On the heavy side of the precipitation distribution, changes in the frequency of days with extreme precipitation (>99 th percentile) vary greatly, notably between the NH and SH MedClim regions. Large increases in the frequency of extreme precipitation days are projected over MED and CAL (+68% and +117%, respectively). SH regions, on the other hand, display small and inconsistent trends in the frequency of extreme precipitation (âˆ’8% over SAF to +11% over AUS).
